ygData.subject: Re: Both Books on merchant on Test server
ygData.msgSnippet: Like some kind of Babel fish? Hey, what? How being able to tinker some pan galactic gargle blasters that render unconscious upon drinking ;P just kidding ;P
ygData.messageBody:
Like some kind of Babel fish?

Hey, what? How being able to tinker some pan galactic gargle blasters that render unconscious upon drinking ;P just kidding ;P

And for the new tinkering items I feel that it is nice to see new stuff ;P
----- Original Message -----
From: Andy Smith
To: 'EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com'
Sent: Monday, November 01, 1999 9:37 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Both Books on merchant on Test server


A live fish eh? Do you stick it in your ear to understand other languages?

-----Original Message-----
So, stop wasting your
cash/time on finding items. All the items needed for the tinkering items
are in the windmills and the new merchant. Also, some strange items like a
medium sized plate helmut and a "live Fish".
